exposurecompensation: -2 EV to +2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
flashmode: Auto / Flash On / Slow Synchro / Flash Off / Advanced Flash
imagestabilization: Optical SteadyShot Image Stabilization with Active Mode
flashrange: ISO Auto: Approx. 0.3m to 2.8m (11 7/8 in. to 9 ft. 2 1/4 in.)(W) / Approx. 1.5m to 2 m (4 ft. 11 1/8 in. to 6 ft. 6 3/4 in.)(T) ISO3200: up to Approx. 5.3 m (17 ft. 4 3/4 in.)(W) / Approx. 3.3 m (11 ft. 10 in.)(T)
focallength: (35mm equivalent) : Still 4:3: 25-200mm / Movie 4:3: 34-272mm (SteadyShot Standard) 34-381 (SteadyShot Active) / Still 16:9: 28-224mm / Movie 16:9: 28-224mm (SteadyShot Standard) 28-314mm (SteadyShot Active)
focusmodes: Multi Point AF / Center Weighted AF / Spot AF / Tracking Focus / Face Tracking Focus
